medical_history.chief_complaint: Post-prandial emesis and intermittent abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 months ago, characterized by post-prandial emesis and intermittent abdominal pain. Last alcohol intake was 2 days prior, with previous daily consumption of 1 bottle of wine. No indications of hematemesis, melena, or bright red blood per rectum.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Alcohol abuse, depression, asthma, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
medical_history.family_history: Family history of alcohol use disorder, liver cancer, emphysema, and stomach cancer.
